summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6272 for the improvement of the alley in Block 7, Aero Heights Addition No. 2, being the alley between 37th Ave. Southwest and 38th Ave. Southwest from Southwest Juneau Street to Southwest Raymond Street; and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91640, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
